tool_description: Find a list of airports matching the search string with Airport Name, Code or Location.
name: World Airports
title: World Airports

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Keyword in Airport Name, City or Code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airports.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
